name: Heal Animal
description:
You heal an animal's wounds, restoring 1d8 Hit Points to the target. The number of actions spent Casting this Spell determines its effect.      somatic The spell has a range of touch.     somatic, verbal The spell has a range of 30 feet and restores an additional 8 Hit Points to the target.

------

Heightened (+1) The amount of healing increases by 1d8, and the additional healing for the 2-action version increases by 8.
